entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Ulukhaktok
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:14 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -16.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ulukhaktok Airport 12:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -16.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -20.6°C
Wind: E 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then blizzard. Blowing snow. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
